The Three Books

All three works are in the public domain.

I

A Guide to Modern Cookery

London, 1907 · English · 2,977 Recipes

The professional masterwork. Every recipe fully searchable — stocks, mother sauces, soups, fish, shellfish, meat, poultry, game, vegetables, eggs, cold buffet, sweets, ices, and drinks.

archive.org — A Guide to Modern Cookery (1907) ✓ 2,977 Recipes Loaded
II

Ma Cuisine

Paris, 1934 · French · 2,022 Recipes

Escoffier’s final word — written for the home kitchen, yet authoritative. Simpler proportions, updated methods, the same classical foundations. All recipes fully indexed here in French.

archive.org — Ma Cuisine (1934) ✓ 2,022 Recipes Loaded
III

Le Livre des Menus

Paris, 1912 · French · Menu Composition

Escoffier’s guide to the art of the menu. Seasonal menus, gala banquet programmes, and the logic of course sequencing. Includes menus for King Edward VII at Buckingham Palace and Windsor Castle.
